knimeNode.name: Reference Column Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Reference Column Filter allows columns to be filtered from the first table using the second table as reference.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows columns to be filtered from the first table using the second table as reference table. Depending on the dialog setting, either the columns from the reference table are included or excluded in the output table.
fullDescription.option: Includes or excludes all columns from the reference table into the resulting table from the first input.

Ensures that the matching columns don't only have the same name but also the same type. Columns are only included or excluded if the column type of the first table is a super-type of the column type from the second table. If not selected, only the column names need to match.

ports.dataIn: Table from which columns are to be included or excluded
Table with the columns used as references
